original_text: So that night, they caused their father to become drunk again. The younger daughter had sex with her father. He did not know when she came to him. And he did not know when she left him.
korean_text: 그 밤에도 그들이 아버지에게 술을 마시게 하고 작은 딸이 일어나 아버지와 동침하니라 그러나 아버지는 그 딸이 눕고 일어나는 것을 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: they caused their father to become drunk again
The younger daughter had sex with her father
He did not know when she came to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀가 그에게 왔을 때 알지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: And he did not know when she left him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그녀가 그를 떠났을 때도 알지 못했습니다
